repairedDockerfile:
# Defines a docker image based on CentOS that includes everything that
# is required to either build the Javabridge or to install the source
# distribution and run the unit tests.

FROM centos
MAINTAINER Lee Kamentsky, leek@broadinstitute.org
RUN yum install -y python-setuptools numpy gcc python-devel java-1.6.0-openjdk-devel && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
